Name: Whisper Books
About the game: Can't concentrate on reading? Movies are getting boring? Not even happy with new anime? Try a visual novel game! Whisper Books tactfully embeds stunning plot and artistic presentation in the simplest play. Here, you will embark on an unparalleled journey! Come and immerse in our unique story and storytelling! Developers also hope that Whisper Books can serve as a stage on which authors demonstrate themselves, so we roll out a feature called the Audition of New Stories. Prompt: The content of Whisper Books can be regarded as an upgraded version of e-book, like a movie with hand-painted illustrations in series, so gameplay is weak relative to storytelling. To fully experience the story, players need to have leisure and mood to watch a movie. The writing style of story copywriting is in tune with the narrative rhythm of dubbing, so too much fast forward will affect the story experience. You may also watch it as a Chinese movie with English subtitles. --Story List-- The Bee Effect Genre: Fantasy, time travel, ancient China. A righteous but depressed young man fancifully strayed into the world of bees and led his soul to salvation for lifetime. The principle of karma is illustrated deftly from ecological equilibrium. The story carries forward Chinese culture and advocates weight to science and environmental protection. Circle of Nightmare Genre: Fantasy, Viking, Transmyths. A group of Vikings and a group of Chinese monks sailed to Vinland. While spreading knowledge to aborigines, they inadvertently impeded the devil’s plan to manipulate aborigines. So they were spotted by the devil. A war staged on, and a hell of cognitive disruption followed...
